name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (Lethian)
description:
Santa's Workshop

A game made for Secret Santa 2022 Game Jam, as a gift for Coby (Topaz). It's a small twist on a tower defense game genre, whereas, as an elf, you're trying to repair broken factory stations, to help Santa in delivering all the presents to children.

Hope you'll have some fun playing it though, have a Jolly Christmas, Coby! 

Controls WASD (xbox left stick) - Walking Mouse (xbox right stick) - Look around Space bar (xbox Y/B) - Jump Mouse LB (xbox A) - Interact Credits

Programming, 3D models and hand drawn textures - Me
Logo - Santa's Workshop by my brother Jakub
Font - Sunday Holiday by semuthitam

No sounds, sorry!
